text: The burden [strongs id="h4853" /] which Habakkuk [strongs id="h2265" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /] did see [strongs id="h2372" tvm="8804" /].

O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], how long shall I cry [strongs id="h7768" tvm="8765" /], and thou wilt not hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /]! [even] cry out [strongs id="h2199" tvm="8799" /] unto thee [of] violence [strongs id="h2555" /], and thou wilt not save [strongs id="h3467" tvm="8686" /]!

Why dost thou shew [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8686" /] me iniquity [strongs id="h0205" /], and cause [me] to behold [strongs id="h5027" tvm="8686" /] grievance [strongs id="h5999" /]? for spoiling [strongs id="h7701" /] and violence [strongs id="h2555" /] [are] before me: and there are [that] raise up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] strife [strongs id="h7379" /] and contention [strongs id="h4066" /].

Therefore the law [strongs id="h8451" /] is slacked [strongs id="h6313" tvm="8799" /], and judgment [strongs id="h4941" /] doth never [strongs id="h5331" /] go forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /]: for the wicked [strongs id="h7563" /] doth compass [strongs id="h3803" tvm="8688" /] about the righteous [strongs id="h6662" /]; therefore wrong [strongs id="h6127" tvm="8794" /] judgment [strongs id="h4941" /] proceedeth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /].

Behold [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8798" /] ye among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /], and regard [strongs id="h5027" tvm="8685" /], and wonder [strongs id="h8539" tvm="8690" /] marvellously [strongs id="h8539" tvm="8798" /]: for [I] will work [strongs id="h6466" tvm="8802" /] a work [strongs id="h6467" /] in your days [strongs id="h3117" /], [which] ye will not believe [strongs id="h0539" tvm="8686" /], though it be told [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8792" /] [you].

For, lo, I raise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8688" /] the Chaldeans [strongs id="h3778" /], [that] bitter [strongs id="h4751" /] and hasty [strongs id="h4116" tvm="8737" /] nation [strongs id="h1471" /], which shall march [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8802" /] through the breadth [strongs id="h4800" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /], to possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8800" /] the dwellingplaces [strongs id="h4908" /] [that are] not theirs.

They [are] terrible [strongs id="h0366" /] and dreadful [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8737" /]: their judgment [strongs id="h4941" /] and their dignity [strongs id="h7613" /] shall proceed [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] of themselves.

Their horses [strongs id="h5483" /] also are swifter [strongs id="h7043" tvm="8804" /] than the leopards [strongs id="h5246" /], and are more fierce [strongs id="h2300" tvm="8804" /] than the evening [strongs id="h6153" /] wolves [strongs id="h2061" /]: and their horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /] shall spread [strongs id="h6335" tvm="8804" /] themselves, and their horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /] shall come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] from far [strongs id="h7350" /]; they shall fly [strongs id="h5774" tvm="8799" /] as the eagle [strongs id="h5404" /] [that] hasteth [strongs id="h2363" tvm="8804" /] to eat [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8800" /].

They shall come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] all for violence [strongs id="h2555" /]: their faces [strongs id="h6440" /] shall sup up [strongs id="h4041" /] [as] the east wind [strongs id="h6921" /], and they shall gather [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8799" /] the captivity [strongs id="h7628" /] as the sand [strongs id="h2344" /].

And they shall scoff [strongs id="h7046" tvm="8691" /] at the kings [strongs id="h4428" /], and the princes [strongs id="h7336" tvm="8802" /] shall be a scorn [strongs id="h4890" /] unto them: they shall deride [strongs id="h7832" tvm="8799" /] every strong hold [strongs id="h4013" /]; for they shall heap [strongs id="h6651" tvm="8799" /] dust [strongs id="h6083" /], and take [strongs id="h3920" tvm="8799" /] it.

Then shall [his] mind [strongs id="h7307" /] change [strongs id="h2498" tvm="8804" /], and he shall pass over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /], and offend [strongs id="h0816" tvm="8804" /], [imputing] this [strongs id="h2098" /] his power [strongs id="h3581" /] unto his god [strongs id="h0433" /].

[Art] thou not from everlasting [strongs id="h6924" /], O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] my God [strongs id="h0430" /], mine Holy One [strongs id="h6918" /]? we shall not die [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /]. O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], thou hast ordained [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] them for judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]; and, O mighty God [strongs id="h6697" /], thou hast established [strongs id="h3245" tvm="8804" /] them for correction [strongs id="h3198" tvm="8687" /].

[Thou art] of purer [strongs id="h2889" /] eyes [strongs id="h5869" /] than to behold [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8800" /] evil [strongs id="h7451" /], and canst [strongs id="h3201" tvm="8799" /] not look [strongs id="h5027" tvm="8687" /] on iniquity [strongs id="h5999" /]: wherefore lookest [strongs id="h5027" tvm="8686" /] thou upon them that deal treacherously [strongs id="h0898" tvm="8802" /], [and] holdest thy tongue [strongs id="h2790" tvm="8686" /] when the wicked [strongs id="h7563" /] devoureth [strongs id="h1104" tvm="8763" /] [the man that is] more righteous [strongs id="h6662" /] than he?

And makest [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] men [strongs id="h0120" /] as the fishes [strongs id="h1709" /] of the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], as the creeping things [strongs id="h7431" /], [that have] no ruler [strongs id="h4910" tvm="8802" /] over them?

They take up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8689" /] all of them with the angle [strongs id="h2443" /], they catch [strongs id="h1641" tvm="8799" /] them in their net [strongs id="h2764" /], and gather [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8799" /] them in their drag [strongs id="h4365" /]: therefore they rejoice [strongs id="h8055" tvm="8799" /] and are glad [strongs id="h1523" tvm="8799" /].

Therefore they sacrifice [strongs id="h2076" tvm="8762" /] unto their net [strongs id="h2764" /], and burn incense [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8762" /] unto their drag [strongs id="h4365" /]; because by them [strongs id="h1992" /] their portion [strongs id="h2506" /] [is] fat [strongs id="h8082" /], and their meat [strongs id="h3978" /] plenteous [strongs id="h1277" /].

Shall they therefore empty [strongs id="h7324" tvm="8686" /] their net [strongs id="h2764" /], and not spare [strongs id="h2550" tvm="8799" /] continually [strongs id="h8548" /] to slay [strongs id="h2026" tvm="8800" /] the nations [strongs id="h1471" /]?

I will stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] upon my watch [strongs id="h4931" /], and set [strongs id="h3320" tvm="8691" /] me upon the tower [strongs id="h4692" /], and will watch [strongs id="h6822" tvm="8762" /] to see [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8800" /] what he will say [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto me, and what I shall answer [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] when I am reproved [strongs id="h8433" /].

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] me, and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Write [strongs id="h3789" tvm="8798" /] the vision [strongs id="h2377" /], and make [it] plain [strongs id="h0874" tvm="8761" /] upon tables [strongs id="h3871" /], that he may run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8799" /] that readeth [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8802" /] it.

For the vision [strongs id="h2377" /] [is] yet for an appointed time [strongs id="h4150" /], but at the end [strongs id="h7093" /] it shall speak [strongs id="h6315" tvm="8686" /], and not lie [strongs id="h3576" tvm="8762" /]: though it tarry [strongs id="h4102" tvm="8698" /], wait [strongs id="h2442" tvm="8761" /] for it; because it will surely [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8800" /] come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /], it will not tarry [strongs id="h0309" tvm="8762" /].

Behold, his soul [strongs id="h5315" /] [which] is lifted up [strongs id="h6075" tvm="8795" /] is not upright [strongs id="h3474" tvm="8804" /] in him: but the just [strongs id="h6662" /] shall live [strongs id="h2421" tvm="8799" /] by his faith [strongs id="h0530" /].

Yea also, because he transgresseth [strongs id="h0898" tvm="8802" /] by wine [strongs id="h3196" /], [he is] a proud [strongs id="h3093" /] man [strongs id="h1397" /], neither keepeth at home [strongs id="h5115" tvm="8799" /], who enlargeth [strongs id="h7337" tvm="8689" /] his desire [strongs id="h5315" /] as hell [strongs id="h7585" /], and [is] as death [strongs id="h4194" /], and cannot be satisfied [strongs id="h7646" tvm="8799" /], but gathereth [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8799" /] unto him all nations [strongs id="h1471" /], and heapeth [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8799" /] unto him all people [strongs id="h5971" /]:

Shall not all these take up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] a parable [strongs id="h4912" /] against him, and a taunting [strongs id="h4426" /] proverb [strongs id="h2420" /] against him, and say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to him that increaseth [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8688" /] [that which is] not his! how long? and to him that ladeth [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8688" /] himself with thick clay [strongs id="h5671" /]!

Shall they not rise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] suddenly [strongs id="h6621" /] that shall bite [strongs id="h5391" tvm="8802" /] thee, and awake [strongs id="h3364" tvm="8799" /] that shall vex [strongs id="h2111" tvm="8772" /] thee, and thou shalt be for booties [strongs id="h4933" /] unto them?

Because thou hast spoiled [strongs id="h7997" tvm="8804" /] many [strongs id="h7227" /] nations [strongs id="h1471" /], all the remnant [strongs id="h3499" /] of the people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall spoil [strongs id="h7997" tvm="8799" /] thee; because of men’s [strongs id="h0120" /] blood [strongs id="h1818" /], and [for] the violence [strongs id="h2555" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /], of the city [strongs id="h7151" /], and of all that dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] therein.

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to him that coveteth [strongs id="h1214" tvm="8802" /] an evil [strongs id="h7451" /] covetousness [strongs id="h1215" /] to his house [strongs id="h1004" /], that he may set [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8800" /] his nest [strongs id="h7064" /] on high [strongs id="h4791" /], that he may be delivered [strongs id="h5337" tvm="8736" /] from the power [strongs id="h3709" /] of evil [strongs id="h7451" /]!

Thou hast consulted [strongs id="h3289" tvm="8804" /] shame [strongs id="h1322" /] to thy house [strongs id="h1004" /] by cutting off [strongs id="h7096" tvm="8800" /] many [strongs id="h7227" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /], and hast sinned [strongs id="h2398" tvm="8802" /] [against] thy soul [strongs id="h5315" /].

For the stone [strongs id="h0068" /] shall cry out [strongs id="h2199" tvm="8799" /] of the wall [strongs id="h7023" /], and the beam out [strongs id="h3714" /] of the timber [strongs id="h6086" /] shall answer [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] it.

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to him that buildeth [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8802" /] a town [strongs id="h5892" /] with blood [strongs id="h1818" /], and stablisheth [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8790" /] a city [strongs id="h7151" /] by iniquity [strongs id="h5766" /]!

Behold, [is it] not of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /] that the people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall labour [strongs id="h3021" tvm="8799" /] in the very [strongs id="h1767" /] fire [strongs id="h0784" /], and the people [strongs id="h3816" /] shall weary [strongs id="h3286" tvm="8799" /] themselves for very [strongs id="h1767" /] vanity [strongs id="h7385" /]?

For the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] shall be filled [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8735" /] with the knowledge [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8800" /] of the glory [strongs id="h3519" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], as the waters [strongs id="h4325" /] cover [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8762" /] the sea [strongs id="h3220" /].

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] unto him that giveth his neighbour [strongs id="h7453" /] drink [strongs id="h8248" tvm="8688" /], that puttest [strongs id="h5596" tvm="8764" /] thy bottle [strongs id="h2573" /] to [him], and makest [him] drunken [strongs id="h7937" tvm="8763" /] also, that thou mayest look [strongs id="h5027" tvm="8687" /] on their nakedness [strongs id="h4589" /]!

Thou art filled [strongs id="h7646" tvm="8804" /] with shame [strongs id="h7036" /] for glory [strongs id="h3519" /]: drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8798" /] thou also, and let thy foreskin be uncovered [strongs id="h6188" tvm="8734" /]: the cup [strongs id="h3563" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] right hand [strongs id="h3225" /] shall be turned [strongs id="h5437" tvm="8735" /] unto thee, and shameful spewing [strongs id="h7022" /] [shall be] on thy glory [strongs id="h3519" /].

For the violence [strongs id="h2555" /] of Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /] shall cover [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8762" /] thee, and the spoil [strongs id="h7701" /] of beasts [strongs id="h0929" /], [which] made them afraid [strongs id="h2865" tvm="8686" /], because of men’s [strongs id="h0120" /] blood [strongs id="h1818" /], and for the violence [strongs id="h2555" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /], of the city [strongs id="h7151" /], and of all that dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] therein.

What profiteth [strongs id="h3276" tvm="8689" /] the graven image [strongs id="h6459" /] that the maker [strongs id="h3335" tvm="8802" /] thereof hath graven [strongs id="h6458" tvm="8804" /] it; the molten image [strongs id="h4541" /], and a teacher [strongs id="h3384" tvm="8688" /] of lies [strongs id="h8267" /], that the maker [strongs id="h3335" tvm="8802" /] of his work [strongs id="h3336" /] trusteth [strongs id="h0982" tvm="8804" /] therein, to make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] dumb [strongs id="h0483" /] idols [strongs id="h0457" /]?

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] unto him that saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8802" /] to the wood [strongs id="h6086" /], Awake [strongs id="h6974" tvm="8685" /]; to the dumb [strongs id="h1748" /] stone [strongs id="h0068" /], Arise [strongs id="h5782" tvm="8798" /], it shall teach [strongs id="h3384" tvm="8686" /]! Behold, it [is] laid [strongs id="h8610" tvm="8803" /] over with gold [strongs id="h2091" /] and silver [strongs id="h3701" /], and [there is] no breath [strongs id="h7307" /] at all in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] of it.

But the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] in his holy [strongs id="h6944" /] temple [strongs id="h1964" /]: let all the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] keep silence [strongs id="h2013" tvm="8761" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] him.
A prayer [strongs id="h8605" /] of Habakkuk [strongs id="h2265" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /] upon Shigionoth [strongs id="h7692" /].

O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], I have heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] thy speech [strongs id="h8088" /], [and] was afraid [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8804" /]: O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], revive [strongs id="h2421" tvm="8761" /] thy work [strongs id="h6467" /] in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] of the years [strongs id="h8141" /], in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] of the years [strongs id="h8141" /] make known [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8686" /]; in wrath [strongs id="h7267" /] remember [strongs id="h2142" tvm="8799" /] mercy [strongs id="h7355" tvm="8763" /].

God [strongs id="h0433" /] came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] from Teman [strongs id="h8487" /], and the Holy One [strongs id="h6918" /] from mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Paran [strongs id="h6290" /]. Selah [strongs id="h5542" /]. His glory [strongs id="h1935" /] covered [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8765" /] the heavens [strongs id="h8064" /], and the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] was full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8804" /] of his praise [strongs id="h8416" /].

And [his] brightness [strongs id="h5051" /] was as the light [strongs id="h0216" /]; he had horns [strongs id="h7161" /] [coming] out of his hand [strongs id="h3027" /]: and there [was] the hiding [strongs id="h2253" /] of his power [strongs id="h5797" /].

Before [strongs id="h6440" /] him went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] the pestilence [strongs id="h1698" /], and burning coals [strongs id="h7565" /] went forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] at his feet [strongs id="h7272" /].

He stood [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8804" /], and measured [strongs id="h4128" tvm="8787" /] the earth [strongs id="h0776" /]: he beheld [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /], and drove asunder [strongs id="h5425" tvm="8686" /] the nations [strongs id="h1471" /]; and the everlasting [strongs id="h5703" /] mountains [strongs id="h2042" /] were scattered [strongs id="h6327" tvm="8691" /], the perpetual [strongs id="h5769" /] hills [strongs id="h1389" /] did bow [strongs id="h7817" tvm="8804" /]: his ways [strongs id="h1979" /] [are] everlasting [strongs id="h5769" /].

I saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] the tents [strongs id="h0168" /] of Cushan [strongs id="h3572" /] in affliction [strongs id="h0205" /]: [and] the curtains [strongs id="h3407" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Midian [strongs id="h4080" /] did tremble [strongs id="h7264" tvm="8799" /].

Was the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] displeased [strongs id="h2734" tvm="8804" /] against the rivers [strongs id="h5104" /]? [was] thine anger [strongs id="h0639" /] against the rivers [strongs id="h5104" /]? [was] thy wrath [strongs id="h5678" /] against the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], that thou didst ride [strongs id="h7392" tvm="8799" /] upon thine horses [strongs id="h5483" /] [and] thy chariots [strongs id="h4818" /] of salvation [strongs id="h3444" /]?

Thy bow [strongs id="h7198" /] was made quite [strongs id="h6181" /] naked [strongs id="h5783" tvm="8735" /], [according] to the oaths [strongs id="h7621" /] of the tribes [strongs id="h4294" /], [even thy] word [strongs id="h0562" /]. Selah [strongs id="h5542" /]. Thou didst cleave [strongs id="h1234" tvm="8762" /] the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] with rivers [strongs id="h5104" /].

The mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] thee, [and] they trembled [strongs id="h2342" tvm="8799" /]: the overflowing [strongs id="h2230" /] of the water [strongs id="h4325" /] passed by [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8804" /]: the deep [strongs id="h8415" /] uttered [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] his voice [strongs id="h6963" /], [and] lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /] his hands [strongs id="h3027" /] on high [strongs id="h7315" /].

The sun [strongs id="h8121" /] [and] moon [strongs id="h3394" /] stood still [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8804" /] in their habitation [strongs id="h2073" /]: at the light [strongs id="h0216" /] of thine arrows [strongs id="h2671" /] they went [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8762" /], [and] at the shining [strongs id="h5051" /] of thy glittering [strongs id="h1300" /] spear [strongs id="h2595" /].

Thou didst march through [strongs id="h6805" tvm="8799" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /] in indignation [strongs id="h2195" /], thou didst thresh [strongs id="h1758" tvm="8799" /] the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /] in anger [strongs id="h0639" /].

Thou wentest forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /] for the salvation [strongs id="h3468" /] of thy people [strongs id="h5971" /], [even] for salvation [strongs id="h3468" /] with thine anointed [strongs id="h4899" /]; thou woundedst [strongs id="h4272" tvm="8804" /] the head [strongs id="h7218" /] out of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the wicked [strongs id="h7563" /], by discovering [strongs id="h6168" tvm="8763" /] the foundation [strongs id="h3247" /] unto the neck [strongs id="h6677" /]. Selah [strongs id="h5542" /].

Thou didst strike through [strongs id="h5344" tvm="8804" /] with his staves [strongs id="h4294" /] the head [strongs id="h7218" /] of his villages [strongs id="h6518" /]: they came out as a whirlwind [strongs id="h5590" tvm="8799" /] to scatter [strongs id="h6327" tvm="8687" /] me: their rejoicing [strongs id="h5951" /] [was] as to devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8800" /] the poor [strongs id="h6041" /] secretly [strongs id="h4565" /].

Thou didst walk [strongs id="h1869" tvm="8804" /] through the sea [strongs id="h3220" /] with thine horses [strongs id="h5483" /], [through] the heap [strongs id="h2563" /] of great [strongs id="h7227" /] waters [strongs id="h4325" /].
